title: Entertaining with Isabel Jones
brief_description: Isabelle Jones, cookery broadcaster and journalist, shows you step-by-step how simple cooking and entertaining really is. This 60-minute video features four different menus for six people. Over 25 tried and tested, delicious recipes in the accompanying cover booklet. Table setting ideas, lots of cooking tips, quick and easy methods. Rated: G
